name: Dodge Hero!
description:
Your favorite game from gym class is taking over your phone!

Swipe your finger across the screen to control your character. Earn a point every for every second you survive, and 5 points for every star you pick up… but watch out for dodge-balls, they’ll be coming from every direction!

Do you have what it takes to be the Dodge Hero?

• Endless game-play
• Very easy one-finger controls, just tap and slide!
• Many goofy and collectible characters
• Daily prizes
• All of your progress is saved in the cloud
• Game Center Leaderboard and Achievements
• Upcoming updates with more game modes and themes coming soon!

Dodge Hero is free to play. Some items in the game are available for purchase.
